divs: Sighting Detailsobject spotted by frances hooper first my motheras we sat in our livingroom...across the road and down slightly is a strand of tall tall pinetrees...she saw a flash which drew her attention and she yelled at me...i justhad to turn slightly in my chair to look out a window and saw a large fire redoblong object floating downward thru the trees...about a mile or so directlybehind the trees is a rather good sized lake...i did have time to move from theliving room into a bedroom and watch it for a few seconds..before going backinto the living room and opening the front door as the object disappeard fromsight..i had turned the sound off the tv and could hear no soundwhatsoever...which told me it couldnt be an airplane in distress..i did call ourlocal police depart. just in case it was a plane in some trouble that had gonedown on the iced over lake...an officer did come to the house...he saw nothingon the lake, but said the dispatcher had called bangor me intl airport and themanchester nh intl airport to see if any planes had disappeard off radar...whenhe questioned me he asked me if i had ever seen a shooting star...which ihave..and when he asked me what size it looked like...from where i was it wasthe size of his cruiser...he looked rather surprised and commented that it thathad been a meteorite and had hit someone would have felt it...this isnt thefirst time i and my mother have seen strange lights during the winter....butthis is the biggest and the brightest...just wondering if anyone else in nh sawanthing
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Wolfeboro
There were no other sightings in Wolfeboro on or around January 31st 2003
